ns0:Data:
Here's your
first
word
to
learn :ns1:Font\n{ اللَّهns1:Font}\nis God's name, very much like you have a given name. While some may translate { اللَّهns1:Font} to "God", this may not be the most accurate. Because "God" is reserved for the word إِلَهns1:Font, which we will learn later in this lesson. So in the simplest terms, "God" (إِلَهns1:Font) is more like the 'type' (analogous to humankind as our type) while " A llans1:Ih ns1:Font" ({اللَّه}) is the actual 'name' (very much like the everyday names "David", "Adam", "Jacob"...etc)
